title: Version 2.0.50 Update
description: Bug fix for MCP tools preventing proper functionality and settings file changes now take effect immediately without requiring restart.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code can debug low-level cryptography
My guy is trying to fix zen-mcp-server with Claude Code

title: Claude Opus 4.5 Public Preview
description: Anthropic's latest Claude Opus 4.5 model now available in GitHub Copilot for Pro, Business, and Enterprise users, delivering high-quality code and powering heavy-duty agentic workflows.

title: GPT-5-Codex Models Released
description: New GPT-5.1-Codex models including GPT-5.1-Codex-Max for long-horizon software engineering tasks and improved CLI with version 0.59.0.

community_feedback.quote: Codex is rapidly degrading — please take this seriously

title: Cursor 2.1 Release
description: Major update featuring improved Plan Mode with interactive AI clarifications, new in-editor AI code review, MCP support, instant grep functionality, and enhanced browser use capabilities.

community_feedback.quote: Composer-1 is really good at plans and really fast too
Frustrating Experience with Cursor – I don't want to use it anymore

title: Version 1.12.142 Update
description: Enhanced SWE-1.5 + Claude Sonnet 4.5 mode with improved Cascade tool performance, better terminal output visibility, and reduced internal errors.

title: 2025 Performance Review Publication
description: Cognition AI published comprehensive performance review showcasing 18 months of AI agent development and improvements.

title: Version 1.5.17 Release
description: Latest release with enhanced file access beyond workspace, improved agent error handling, CLI stability fixes, and Next Edit powered by Mercury Coder for intelligent code edit suggestions.

title: Aider-CE v0.88.12 Release
description: Community edition fork update with continued development and improvements to the AI pair programming tool.

title: Version 0.15.0 Update
description: Major UI improvements with seamless scrollable interface, mouse support, and enhanced user experience for better terminal navigation.
